INGREDIENTS:


• Chicken -300gm(with bone) 
 • Green chilli-3 finely chopped 
 • Ginger – small piece(slice finely )
 • Garlic- 1 (thin slices) 
 • Curry leaves-1 string
 • Pepper powder-less than 1/4tsp
 • Salt-to taste
 • Potato-1 medium
 • Coconut Oil-2tbsp
 • Thin coconut milk-2 cup
 • Thick coconut milk-1/2 cup
 • Water-1/4cup

 For sauting: 

 • Onion-1 medium
 • Green chilli-2(long slits) 
 • Curry leaves-few
 • Ginger-1tsp thin slices
 • Garam masala-1/2tsp(handful of fennel seeds(perumjeerakam),10 cloves(karayam poo),4 medium stick of cinnamon(patta),3 cardamom (elakkaya ) 1 star anise (thakkolam) ) Grind well to fine powder ..Sieve and use .. No need to roast them
 
 METHOD: 

 1. Cut the chicken into small pieces.. 
 2. Wash well with salt .. Drain .. 
 3. To the chicken add ginger ,garlic,green chilli ,curry leaves ,pepper powder and salt and mix well with hand …
 4. Keep aside for 15 minutes.. 
 5. Then add 1/4 cup of water and pressure cook .. 4 whistle is enough .. 
 6. Keep aside ..Allow to cool.. 
 7. In between wash one potato peel and cut into cubes and pressure cook it by adding salt and water.. 
 8. Now heat oil in a kadai .. 
 9. Saute onion slices for 3 minutes in medium flame .. 
 10. To that add ginger slices,green chilli slits and curry leaves .. 
 11. Saute them till the onion become translucent .. 
 12. Now add cooked chicken along with stock .. 
 13. Add potato also… To this add 1/4 tsp of garam masala and mix well … Allow to cook for 2 minutes ..Slightly mash potato with back of the spoon …
 14. Then add thin coconut milk and stir well.. Cook for 5 minutes or until the stew start thickening .. 
 15. In that point add our thick coconut milk and stir slowly .. Sprinkle the remaining garam masala(1/4 tsp ) if u don’t prefer garam masala decrease the amount .. Cook for 2 minutes. 
 16. No need to boil after adding thick milk ..Remove from the fire and sprinkle few curry leaves and 1 tsp of coconut oil .. 
 17. Close the kadai for few minutes and serve with appam ,idiyappam ,chapati ….
 18. If u want u can roast cashew nuts in ghee and season the stew .. Or can season with small onion also …

 Note : The spice of the dish is depending up on the green chilli u r using .. So adjust the spice accordingly
